title: invitation
subtitle: sign up through your friend's link.
features_subtitle: supported platforms and download modes are listed below.
rule: after you sign up, your inviter will automatically receive 50 points.
cta_subtitle: sign up to complete the invitation.
signed_in_hint: you're signed in. we'll try to register this invite automatically.
claimed: success! we've rewarded your inviter with 50 points.
already: this account has already used an invite link.
too_old: invites only work for newly created accounts.
self: you can't use your own invite link.
error: something went wrong while claiming the invite.
